name: Friday Night Dinner
description:
Boyfriend has been invited by Daddy Dearest to have a sit-down dinner with the family. Will you survive it? :)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Possible Bug: You might have to click the screen after you hit "New Game" to proceed.

Inspired by the creations of the original Friday Night Funkin which you can play here: 

https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Music Credits: Gatsby
